content:encoded:
This time on Case Closed, we begin with The Chapel Hill Case, from Richard Diamond Private Detective. That story aired in December of 1950.

(24:27) Our second episode is from The Adventures Of Ellery Queen. We hear his April 29, 1948, episode titled, The Three Frogs.

Download CaseClosed709

Relic Radio is made possible by the support of its listeners. If you’re able to help out visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
